body_html: Hmmm. You know, in cltorch, I used to have 0-dimensinoal tensors. I used this to eg store the results of full reductions, to avoid implicit sync points, https://github.com/hughperkins/cltorch#point-tensors-reduce-pipeline-stalls

body: Hmmm. You know, in cltorch, I used to have 0-dimensinoal tensors. I used this to eg store the results of full reductions, to avoid implicit sync points, https://github.com/hughperkins/cltorch#point-tensors-reduce-pipeline-stalls
